channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Welcome to Hugo-Geo!
item.description: Welcome to hugo-geo, a resposive theme for the Hugo static site generator. Hugo is designed for post and tutorial sections, and is perfect for personal portfolio or blog sites. Why don’t you check out the Getting Started Tutorial and find out how you can use hugo-geo and customize it to your liking.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
